page.title: 17AN OLD MANS VIEW
page.content: AN OLD MANS VIEW ________________ We asked an old man who has lived in our village all his life what changes had taken place in his lifetime.This was his reply. "I have seen many changes but the biggest change was when we got electricity for the first time.Another change was the building of the council estate some 30 years ago.The village doubled in size and maybe lost some of its warmth.People now mind their own business,whereas in the old days everyone knew everyone else.The number of men who work in the quarry has gone down a lot.One change that I'm glad took place is the Health service.People live a lot longer today because of a good health service."
